title: x86_64-pc-windows-gnu: ld: cannot find -lcredui and -lsecur32 after upgrading to rustc 1.26.0-nightly (521d91c6b 2018-03-14)

labels.name: C-enhancement
labels.description: Category: An issue proposing an enhancement or a PR with one.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-nightly
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to nightly.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:

>          
> error: aborting due to previous error
> error: Could not compile `serde_derive`.


It builds fine with nightly-2018-03-07

https://ci.appveyor.com/project/laumann/compiletest-rs/build/1.0.38/job/rcfcfv3mfmx7h6t3

The relevant code here: https://github.com/laumann/compiletest-rs/pull/108
